column4: text
The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It get stronger legs now. It looks kind of funny but the legs do look clumsy.
column9: I like this little guy. I think it can make me happier but might consume more energy as it is not used to the legs.
column12: Clumsy legs means he will get tired quickly and I'd need more time to take care of thim. Nah I'll pass.

column4: The short leg human are discrimated by other human. They think the short ones are not "nature"
column9: The ones with the shorter legs are not good at fighting. Some get killed during the battle.
column10: Kill the leader of the "nature" human
column13: The battle stopped immediately. Another peaceful day on the planet.

column4: the human with pincer and human with tentacle has a battle.
column9: There is no way tentacle human can win the pincer ones, just like paper can't win scissors. Some tentacle human get killed. I don't like this result.

column4: A spaceship flied pass and I caught it. Some human in it.
column9: You get some more human. But they don't like the life here and somehow make all human less efficient. Weird. I think this place is a paradise.
column12: Haha, their faces are funny when I put them in my mouth.

column4: A spaceship flied pass and I caught it. Some human in it.
column9: You get some more human. But they don't like the life here and somehow make all human less efficient. Weird. I think this place is a paradise.
column12: Haha, their faces are funny when I put them in my mouth.

column4: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It can breath without helmet.
column9: I like this little guy. It can breath better so consume energy slower. But it also eats more…Guess eating in helmet making all food nasty.
column12: What does it want to do without helmet? I can't imagine it and just don’t want to take the risk.

column4: Human recently gather together and discuss things together, I've seen someone with no helmet show in the discussioni everytime.
column9: Ha, they are just some stupic human, let them discuss, I'd like to see what can they do.
column12: I killed some human without helmet, human stop discussion and get back to work now. Good job to myself!

column4: You wake up one day and all or your human disappear. They must be seduced by the new comers and the ones do not neet helmet lead this. I should have stopped them. Now I'm alone again.
The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has a pincer arm… Might be a good help as a cook but I think the shape is quite dangerous to my tentacles…
column9: I like this little guy. It can take care of itself better and make more food for itself.
column12: I don't like that they have pincer, looks dangerous

column4: human start to worship the ones with pincer
Human start to make some tools similar to pincer and carry them as accessory.
Human attack you with their tiny pincers.
You are attacked by their pincers. They think they killed you and start to celebrate.
column9: You pretend you are dead and they got lost after celebration. Then they start to attack each other and shortly all of them are dead. Maybe not a good idea to give them weapon.
column12: I'm furious and just kill them all. Disobedient toys have no value. Let's see if we can catch some other toys later.
column17:
I killed some human that leads the attack. And human stop making a scene. I saved them from chaos of 
anarchism again

column4: There is a small meteo fly to you.
column12: I sent one human out and let it hit the meteo and change the meteor's direction.

column4: There is a medium meteo fly to you.
column12: I sent two human out and let it hit the meteo and change the meteor's direction.

column4: There is a huge meteo fly to you.
column12: I sent three human out and let it hit the meteo and change the meteor's direction.

column4: The planet is covered by the dust from the meteor. You are ok with that but your little human seems can't hold it. All of them are coughing and dying.
column9: Maybe take care of the meteor next, those human are really vulnerable.
column12: I sent four human out and let it hit the meteo and change the meteor's direction.

column4: A spaceship passed and the one on the ship is interested to your human. He want to exchange some of his collection with you.
Funny, those little humans start to raise their own pets
column9: Might not be a bad idea to let them keep some small hobbies.

column4: The human start to train their pets to work. Hmm.
The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has tentacle arm. It does not work as good as arms it used to have, but hey these tentacles make it looks more like my specy.
column9: I like this little guy. I'm happy to see they have tentacles just like me, though it makes them works not so efficient in making food.
column12: Like me or not, if it can not take care of itself I don't want it.

column4: human start to worship the ones with tentacle
column9: Human worship tentacle and think you are their god and create them. I like this result, especially the part that they are working harder now.

column4: Human start to make some tentacle stickers and put on themselves. The tentacle clothes become a new fashion in human.
column9: They look more and more like me. Why not.

column4: Human treat those with tentacle arms like noble. One of the tentacle human even said he is the king and the representative of god, namely me.
column9: Hmm not a big fan of them acting like they are special. They are all just normal human. But nah I don't care.

column4: Human are oppressed by the tentacle king and start to resist him.
column9: Eating my fish and waiting what might happen next.

column4: Human start to think, since they can kill tentacle king, they can kill you too…
Tentacle king thinks he is not just the representative, but the god itself, he start to conspiracy to kill you.
Tentacle king decides to do human sacrifice every day to maintain his rule.
Those little human can not make me anymore. I'm going to dump them all and stop wasting my time.
column9: I feel lonely again after decades.. Maybe it's time to find something new.

column4: They didn't prepare enough food for them and they fight each other for food and they all die.
column9: Hmm maybe I should be more careful next. Those little guys are quite vulnerable, don't know how did they survive without me.

column4: What happened? All your human just die and not enough left to keep reproduce.
